articles.content: Sequoia Capital's accelerator programme Surge will increase the amount of capital it will invest in seed-stage startups to be able to back a wider range of companies and stay with them longer as they… [+5333 chars]

articles.title: Market outlook uncertain, stocks with high dividend yields seen as best bet
